name: Save The World! (clrflapple)
description:
SAVE THE WORLD!

Our character, who is on a military mission, is trying to kill monsters that are trying to take over abandoned cities.

You have 4 weapons in the game, each weapon's damage and fire rates are different.

You can upgrade your weapons, health, and armor from the shop.

You can get medkits, armor, and ammo from the shop.

There are 4 regions in the game, after clearing these 4 regions, you need to find the gate on the map and go there.

The game consists of 10 levels.

--------------

Controls

Movement(W,A,S,D)

Fire (Left Click)

Zoom(Right Click)

Use Medkit(E)

Shop(B) you have to be inside of the shop!

Reload (R)

Jump(Space)

Run(LeftShift)

Menu(ESC)

----------------------

Notes from the developer

This game is the first game I made with Unity. I don't expect any profit from this game.

I specified the artists and resources I used in the production of the game in the main menu.

A big thank you to the people who created and designed the resources I used in the game!

The codes on the script side of the game are completely mine. 

I made the scene and map design of the game myself. I made the animations of the weapons used by the character in the game myself.

This game was made for PC, but it has also been converted into WebGL format so that it can be played on the website. Therefore, there may be fps issues or poor graphics quality in WebGL format. If you want to play and experience the game fully, please download the Windows version! 

Finally, it will tell you that you lose the first time you enter the game, as it cannot read the date initially due to a problem with the WebGL format. This is a problem that occurs entirely in WebGL format, which is not present in the PC version. If you encounter such an error, please click restart level.

**Fix Notes

Decreased mouse sensitivity for the web version.
